description: Commands to manage a vSphere Replication (VR) addon.

commands.name: az vmware addon vr create
commands.summary: Create a vSphere Replication (VR) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon vr create --private-cloud
                          --resource-group
                          --vrs-count
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az vmware addon vr create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --vrs-count 1

commands.name: az vmware addon vr delete
commands.summary: Delete a vSphere Replication (VR) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon vr delete [--ids]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--private-cloud]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--subscription]
                          [--yes]
examples: az vmware addon vr delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon vr show
commands.summary: Show details of a vSphere Replication (VR) addon for a private cloud.
examples: az vmware addon vr show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud

commands.name: az vmware addon vr update
commands.summary: Update a vSphere Replication (VR) addon for a private cloud.
commands.syntax:
az vmware addon vr update --vrs-count
                          [--add]
                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--ids]
                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                          [--private-cloud]
                          [--remove]
                          [--resource-group]
                          [--set]
                          [--subscription]
examples: az vmware addon vr update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --private-cloud MyPrivateCloud --vrs-count 1
